node.text:
Evidence-based natural solutions for mast cell activation syndrome (MCAS) and histamine intolerance.

I discuss histamine-degrading probiotic questions, herbs and vitamins proven to decrease histamine burden, and the natural plant-based extract that is more effective than cromolyn sodium.

This is not a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a licensed physician before implementing any intervention.

Follow me on Instagram. www.Instagram.com/empoweredautoimmune

Sign up for my newsletter: www.empoweredautoimmune.com

Join my private Facebook group: https://m.facebook.com/groups/2096595183900470

node.title: Holistic Approaches for Mast Cell Activation Syndrome (MCAS)

node.text:
I discuss what research point to as the underlying cause of polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS) and some simple evidence-based holistic strategies to promote insulin sensitivity and thus address PCOS.

This should not be construed as a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a licensed physician. 
Follow me at Instagram.com/empoweredautoimmune

Subscribe to my newsletter at www.empoweredautoimmune.com

Join my private Facebook group for women healing from autoimmune disease and chronic illness https://m.facebook.com/groups/2096595183900470

node.title: Viewer Question: What do you think of Vitex for PCOS?

node.text:
I discuss the research that reveals the therapeutic potential of cannabis and psychedelic agents for reversing symptomatology of PTSD as well as anxiety, depression, psychosis, and addiction.

This is not to be construed as a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Do not try any of these strategies without first consulting a licensed medical doctor. I am not a health care practitioner.

Read my article here on marijuana for mood disorders: 
http://www.greenmedinfo.com/blog/marijuana-future-ptsd-treatment

Subscribe to my email newsletter: www.empoweredautoimmune.com

Join my private Facebook group where I present research on reversing autoimmunity and chronic illness naturally (answer questions for entry): https://m.facebook.com/groups/2096595183900470

node.title: Marijuana & Psychedelics for PTSD: What the Science Actually Says

Subscribe to my newsletter at www.empoweredautoimmune.com

node.text:
Let’s stop judging people when we have no idea about the underlying medical conditions with which they contend, the harm they may have suffered at the hands of the allopathic medical establishment, or their legitimate reasons for abstaining from or partaking in any particular medical decision. ⁣ ⁣
⁣
Many are entrenched in the dogma & religiosity of scientism & biomedicine until they or someone they know is injured by pharma.⁣
⁣
Their entire worldview shatters & they can't help but to question & deconstruct the cult of biomedicine, & see much of it doesn't hold up to scrutiny.⁣
⁣
Instead of vilifying and character assassinating those who object to blanket medicine, why not ask them their experiences?⁣
⁣
Instead of gaslighting those who have been harmed by certain medical interventions, why not take them at their word? ⁣
⁣
Instead of perpetuating division, why not ask with genuine curiosity why so many object?⁣
⁣
Why not take time to hear their stories? To validate their suffering? To believe the trauma they have endured? To give them a voice? To honor their choices, even if different from yours?⁣
⁣
Just asking 🤷🏼‍♀️

node.text:
No credential has a dominion on knowledge.⁣
⁣
No licensure has monopoly on expertise.⁣
⁣
My quintessential message and mission is promotion of bodily autonomy, medical freedom, informed consent, and personal empowerment in your health. ⁣
⁣
You are fundamentally entitled to information on all of the risks and benefits regarding any medical procedure. ⁣
⁣
You retain the right to perform a cost-benefit analysis to ascertain whether any particular regimen, protocol, or intervention is right for you. ⁣
⁣
Consent is fundamentally violated when you are pressured, coerced, or manipulated into any medical intervention or when your legitimate concerns or symptoms are bypassed or dismissed--a toxic form of medical gaslighting and an insidious form of medical paradigm-perpetuated abuse. ⁣
⁣
NO MEANS NO when it comes to sovereignty over what you put on or into your body and any steps to circumvent that comprise an unacceptable infringement upon your free will and bodily agency. ⁣
⁣
No longer are doctors the exclusive gatekeepers to an elite verbiage that no one else can understand, the anointed sole experts on the inner workings of your body.⁣
⁣
No longer can we subscribe to the meme that only those with alphabet soup after their names are esteemed guardians of a sacred body of privileged knowledge.⁣
⁣
You are the foremost expert on your body—and in the Information age, the keys to your health are not sequestered in a sacred lock box accessible only by physician-deities, but buried deep within the innate, ancestral, and evolutionary wisdom with which we have all been imbued.⁣
⁣
Most of all, the answers are found not by searching outside ourselves, by giving our power away—but by getting curious about the messages our bodies are communicating and by returning to our instincts and our intuition.⁣
⁣
Power is maintained by hierarchy, but the last vestiges of the “I know what’s best for you” paternalism which has permeated so many spheres of society including the medical industrial complex are struggling to maintain their stranglehold on our consciousness.⁣
⁣
You have the power to reclaim your agency. The answers reside within.

node.text:
Oftentimes healing is less about what you ADD, and more about removing exposures that are not conducive to health.⁣
⁣
Here are a few to address to promote healing:⁣
⁣
✔️ dysfunctional relationships ⁣
✔️ blue light exposure + circadian rhythm disturbance⁣
✔️ toxic personal care products, cleaning supplies⁣
✔️ household insecticides, pesticides, rodenticides⁣
✔️ chlorinated and fluoridated drinking water⁣
✔️ indoor air pollution ⁣
✔️ toxic thoughts and behavioral habits⁣
✔️ parasitic overgrowths + stealth infections⁣
✔️ mold + heavy metal toxicity⁣
✔️ artificial sweeteners, colorants, excitotoxins, and other synthetic food additives⁣
✔️ refined sugars and flours, inflammatory seed oils, processed foods⁣
✔️ sleep disruption ⁣
✔️ sedentary lifestyle⁣
✔️ loneliness + social isolation ⁣
✔️ chronic stress⁣
✔️ overtraining ⁣
✔️ dysbiosis and endotoxemia ⁣
✔️ smoking and excess alcohol consumption⁣
⁣
Sometimes engendering health is less about what you ADD, and more about dismantling the barriers that stand in the way of healing and provide the stimuli for health, and then getting out of the body's way.⁣
⁣
Did any of the aforementioned factors contribute to your health issues? ⁣
⁣
Are there any I missed? 🤔 ⁣
⁣
Let me know in the comments 👇🏼 ⁣

node.text:
No one but you has the intimate knowledge of your body and its needs--and no one but you has the final say when it comes to your body and the truth of what is right for you.⁣
⁣
Here is your daily reminder not to outsource your power, but instead to take heed of and bear witness to that little voice inside ✨ ⁣
⁣
What is your intuition telling you? 👇🏼

node.text:
In a new report by Commonwealth Fund, which analyzed 71 health care performance measures across 5 categories in wealthy countries, the USA ranked DEAD LAST in administrative efficiency, equity + access to care, & health care outcomes despite spending 17% of its GDP on health care.⁣
⁣
Of the richest nations, the USA has also been found to have the highest infant mortality rate and lowest life expectancy at age 60 relative to other countries.⁣
⁣
People are righteously skeptical of the biomedical paradigm, which has been one of the leading causes of mortality. ⁣
⁣
The magic bullet, pill-for-every-ill approaches of the allopathic establishment have oftentimes done more harm that good, & people are righteously suspicious of a pharmaceutical industry that has historically perpetuated incalculable levels of harm and corruption.⁣
⁣
You can't expect the populace to trust an inherently broken system that has proven itself to be adulterated by insidious conflicts of interest, tainted by agenda, and marked by an incestuous relationship between industry and the governmental agencies that supposedly regulate it.⁣
⁣
You can't expect the populace to trust a health care system that research has shown to be, on average, 17 years behind the published peer-reviewed literature.⁣
⁣
And you can't expect blind faith in an institution that so many have been irrevocably harmed or failed by.⁣
⁣
Patients. Deserve. Better. Period.

node.text:
Blanket medicine is bad medicine.⁣
⁣
The one-size-fits-all strategy currently being pushed is just one reason why health care outcomes in this country are abysmal, with the USA ranking DEAD LAST in health care outcomes among the wealthiest nations, despite spending the most.⁣
⁣
Blanket medicine is bad medicine.⁣
⁣
One size fits all when no two people are the same—when everyone presents with different risk factors, comorbidities, immune terrains, family histories, and genetic polymorphisms—means some people will be irreparably injured.⁣
⁣
Blanket medicine is bad medicine, doctors aren’t infallible, and the "experts" make mistakes.⁣
⁣
Blind faith in these institutions is just one reason why iatrogenesis (harm or death incurred secondary to use of allopathic medicine) is one of the leading causes of mortality.⁣
⁣
Make decisions about your health from a place of empowerment, not fear.⁣
⁣
From gut instinct, not intimidation.⁣
⁣
From intuition, not coercion.⁣
⁣
Don't forget that YOU and only you are the expert authority on your own body.⁣
⁣
👉🏼 Follow me @empoweredautoimmune

node.text:
We have been quintessentially sold the narrative that our bodies are defective and in need of an endless barrage of pharmaceuticals--that our corporeal form is broken and requires constant allopathic tinkering--and that health lies fundamentally at the bottom of a prescription bottle. ⁣
⁣
Conventional medicine fails to acknowledge the infinite healing potentiality imbued within the human body, and instead convinces us we require constant pharmaceutical tinkering from a savior in a white coat. ⁣
⁣
It instills a fundamental distrust of our body's own ability to heal. ⁣
⁣
The biomedical paradigm robs of us our own self-efficacy, our own ancestrally encoded primal wisdom, and distances us from our gut instincts on what is good or bad for us.⁣
⁣
Don't fall for the lie it sells that you are fundamentally broken and that healing lies only in pharma.⁣
⁣
Never forget that our body's responses are often adaptive and compensatory and that every cell in your body is conspiring to protect you.⁣
⁣
When we restore evolutionarily compatible inputs and remove the barriers to wellness, our body's instinct is to heal.⁣
⁣
Oftentimes healing is less about what you ADD, and more about removing exposures that are not conducive to health.⁣
⁣
Dismantle the barriers that stand in the way of healing and provide the stimuli for health, and then get out of the body's way.⁣
⁣
Disclaimer: Not medical advice. All information contained herein is for educational purposes only.

node.text:
Some of the simplest medicine is free.⁣
⁣
Ever since I was a young girl, I always gravitated to the sun. Growing up in cold climates, I felt utterly deprived of it in the winter months, so when summer came, I spent ever second I could basking in its precious rays.⁣
⁣
It didn't sit right with me that something felt so innately healing, so immensely restorative, could be bad for you.⁣
⁣
I also felt most at peace walking through the forest or putting my toes in the sand by the beach, and growing up, my mom was always begging my sister and I to get outside and "get some fresh air."⁣
⁣
As I've gotten older, and leaned more and more into my intuition, I have found that reconnecting with nature in these simple ways is where the true healing resides.⁣
⁣
Letting the sun kiss my skin, relishing in my bare feet on the earth, absorbing the negative ions of the ocean, regulating my nervous system through birdsong, fine-tuning my hormonal symphony by allowing the wavelengths of outdoor light into my eyes, experiencing the healing power of human touch...these interventions are free yet have been the biggest game changers in my own health.⁣
⁣
The further we depart from nature, the more ideal the breeding ground for disease, debility, and dysfunction.⁣
⁣
Yet we have been quintessentially sold the narrative that our bodies are defective and in need of an endless barrage of pharmaceuticals--that our corporeal form is broken and requires constant allopathic tinkering--and that health lies fundamentally at the bottom of a prescription bottle.⁣
⁣
The message of my page is to trust in your own innate intuition, to return to the healer that resides within you, and to trust that little voice inside that tells you what you need.⁣
⁣
Before expecting to find the answers at the bottom of a prescription bottle, why not turn back to the basics & rectify the divorce from nature which is the wellspring of disease?⁣
⁣
Having pillars of health in place can oftentimes negate the need for allopathic medicine altogether.⁣
⁣
What changes have made the biggest positive difference in your own health journey? ⁣
⁣
Let me know below 👇🏼

node.text:
Here is one example of a functional food & a meal I have been eating for breakfast each day to support thyroid health & improve my Hashimoto's!⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
It's just oatmeal, of course, I'm no culinary wiz 😬 but the strategic incorporation of ingredients can support thyroid health (& gut health, which is of foremost concern with any autoimmune condition) via inclusion of foods rich in certain thyroid cofactors as well as foods that act as prebiotics to selectively promote growth of commensal flora within the microbiome.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Including foods that support the microbiome--the bacterial residents of your body which are estimated to outnumber your own cells 10:1--is important because they contribute to a plethora of important processes, including detoxification of xenobiotics, immune system function, & even genesis of certain vitamins & neurotransmitters.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Likewise, including foods that may reinforce integrity of the gastrointestinal tract, like collagen, is noteworthy because leaky gut syndrome (pathologic intestinal permeability) has been identified as a precursor to every autoimmune condition in which it has been studied.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
This is why Hippocrates famously said, "All disease begins in the gut," & why gut health is such a focal point of natural & holistic medicine.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Here are some of the other thyroid & gut supportive ingredients I include:⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
✔️ berries - rich in antioxidants like anthocyanins to mitigate oxidative stress as well as polyphenols that act as prebiotics⁣⁣⁣
✔️ pumpkin seeds - good source of zinc, required for T4 to T3 thyroid hormone conversion ⁣⁣⁣
✔️ Brazil nuts - richest dietary source of selenium, needed for thyroid hormone synthesis & metabolism (you only need a couple a day!)⁣⁣⁣
✔️ collagen peptides - rich in amino acids like glycine, glutamine & proline that help to strengthen gut lining integrity, reduce gut wall inflammation, & repair tight junctions that are compromised in leaky gut syndrome⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
👉🏼 Use discount code "ALI" for 15% off my favorite grass-fed, pasture-raised, & wild-caught collagen peptides from @furtherfood⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Are you an oatmeal fan? Do you tolerate oats? Let me know in the comments 👇🏼😍

node.text:
"When you tear out a man's tongue, you are not proving him a liar, you're only telling the world that you fear what he might say." ― George R.R. Martin ⁣
⁣
It's an odd and Orwellian time indeed when data counter to the mainstream narrative cannot be discussed without the threat of being canceled, platforms jeopardized, and "fact checkers" with vested interests emerging from the woodwork.⁣
⁣
True scientific inquiry entails the development and exploration of dissenting hypotheses, evolution of newfound stances based upon the synthesis and assimilation of incoming data, and forums of uncensored, open, and civil discourse.⁣
⁣
As eloquently articulated by Albert Einstein, "Science can only flourish in an atmosphere of free speech."⁣
⁣
Critical to the emergence of safe products is long-term safety data, randomized controlled blinded trials of long-term health consequences in populations vulnerable to medical product induced injury (such as autoimmune cohorts), and manufacturers who are held liable and accountable for adverse reactions.⁣
⁣
Critical to informed consent is that consumers are given an opportunity to make their own decisions based on their own individualized risk-reward analysis and education on potential adverse sequelae, as no pharmaceutical product is without risk.⁣
⁣
Where there is risk, there must always, always, always be a choice.⁣
⁣
And where there is risk, there must be unfettered access to all sides of the story - there must be dialogue with dissenting and contrarian voices - as a litmus test for where the truth indeed resides.⁣
⁣
"Once a government is committed to the principle of silencing the voice of opposition, it has only one way to go, and that is down the path of increasingly repressive measures, until it becomes a source of terror to all its citizens and creates a country where everyone lives in fear." - Harry Truman

node.text:
When it comes to the consequences of your medical decisions, you are ultimately the one who has to live with them.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
In the case of iatrogenesis (harm incurred secondary to use of the medical establishment, one of the leading causes of death), it is you who potentially pays the price.⁣⁣
⁣
As such, only you can perform a cost benefit analysis and decide what's right--or what's wrong for you.⁣
⁣⁣
As a patient, you are entitled to informed consent—full knowledge of the potential benefits and risks of an intervention, at which point you can voluntarily acquiesce OR reject the procedure.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Your body, your choice.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
We all having different family histories, genetic predispositions and polymorphisms, prevailing comorbidities, immune landscapes, microbial terrains, biochemical milieus, and propensities to adverse reactions—information to which no stranger is privy.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
It is not up to you to decide what is best for another person, just like it’s not up to a random stranger to dictate what’s best for your health. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Let’s stop judging people when we have no idea about the underlying medical conditions with which they contend, the harm they may have suffered at the hands of the allopathic medical establishment, or their legitimate reasons for abstaining from or partaking in any particular medical decision. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
What another person does with their vessel—what medical procedure they consent to or refuse—is absolutely none of my (or your) business.
